definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing heaven/male principle/☰/ancient Chinese compass point: 315° (northwest)

sentences.english: He likes alcohol, but only drinks white spirits.
sentences.chinese: 喝酒，而且只喝老白乾兒。

sentences.english: The old man has the habit of drinking a little white wine before meals.
sentences.chinese: 老爺子就喜歡飯前喝一口白乾兒。
